Dyslexic Character Sheets

Totally custom

Class-specific, ancestry-specific, background-specific, archetype-specific, these character sheets are unique to your character in every way

Made for print

You can fill these in on the PC, but they're really made for printing

Free, patron-supported

The character sheets are completely free. Patrons get extra features, like early access to new content.

Useful pages

Spellbooks, formula books, animal companions, archetypes, inventory pages, map minis, lycanthropes, intelligent weapons and many more

Beautifully custom

Choose colours and background, pick or upload a character picture, and make your character sheets your own

Accessibility options

Choose dyslexic fonts, large print and high contrast options if you need them

Translations

Available in different languages (options vary)

Open source

The entire source of this project is on GitHub and released under an open license

Login

Login with Patreon to get access to patron-only features.

Login with Patreon

Logging in will set a cookie on your PC. This does not contain any personally identifiable information, and will not be sent to any third party.

Become a patron

Patrons get the ability to edit all the fields, have calculations work automatically, and save character sheets. Login with Patreon to unlock these features:

Support the site and gain access to extra features for just $1 by becoming a patron.
